CookieStore.summary: The CookieStore interface of the {{domxref("Cookie Store API", "", "", "nocode")}} provides methods for getting and setting cookies asynchronously from either a page or a service worker.

remarks.para: The CookieStore is accessed via attributes in the global scope in a or context. Therefore there is no constructor.

CookieStoreChange.summary: A change event is fired at a object when a change is made to any cookie.

CookieStoreDelete.summary:
The delete() method of the interface deletes a cookie that matches the given name or options object.
The method expires the cookie by changing its date to one in the past.

remarks.para: Note that there is no error if a cookie cannot be matched: the returned promise will fulfill when the matched cookie is deleted or if no cookie is matched.

CookieStoreDelete.returns: A that resolves with when the deletion operation completes or no cookie is matched.

CookieStoreGet.summary: The get() method of the interface returns a {{jsxref("Promise")}} that resolves to a single cookie matching the given name or options object. The method will return the first cookie that matches.
CookieStoreGet.returns: A that resolves with an object representing the first cookie matching the submitted name or options, or null if there is no matching cookie.The object returned for a match contains the following properties:

CookieStoreGetAll.summary:
The getAll() method of the interface returns a {{jsxref("Promise")}} that resolves as an array of cookies that match the name or options passed to it.
Passing no parameters will return all cookies for the current context.
CookieStoreGetAll.returns: A that resolves with an array of objects representing cookies that match the given name or options.Each object contains the following properties:

CookieStoreSet.summary: The set() method of the interface sets a cookie with the given name and value or options object.
CookieStoreSet.returns: A that resolves with when setting the cookie completes.
